metadata.title: CVE-2017-0485 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability in Mediaserver could enable an attackerto use a specially crafted file to cause a device hang or reboot. Thisissue is rated as High severity due to the possibility of remote denial ofservice. Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1. Android ID:A-33387820.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
